title: Episode 68 - Air War in Korea The Eagle and the Dragon
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: In this episode, we review the surprise introduction of the MIG 15 and the battle for air superiority in the new jet age. The US Air force attempts to stop the flow of supplies and reinforcements south and switches to night bombing after heavy losses. The air force also faces HR issues as a result of the war longer than expected.
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, we review the surprise introductâ€¦
description: In this episode, we review the surprise introduction of the MIG 15 and the battle for air superiority in the new jet age. The US Air force attempts to stop the flow of supplies and reinforcements south and switches to night bombing after heavy losses. The air force also faces HR issues as a result of the war longer than expected.
